name: Barbie and the Magic of Pegasus
name_original: Barbie and the Magic of Pegasus
description: The evil Wenlock has turned everyone in the kingdom to stone and girls must help Barbie as Princess Annika and Brietta, her magnificent flying horse, on a quest to break the wizard’s spell. Play exciting mini-games, solve puzzles and avoid obstacles – throughout 20 fantastic levels and five locations of play – all in search of magical jewels to give the Wand of Light special powers to restore the villagers.
